Shit, The Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxy, and even The Winter Soldier had some pretty dark moments, but they always balanced it with a sense of fun. Serious is not a bad word but fun should not be outlawed.

Exactly! And that's what I have problem with D.C. I love em don't get me wrong but Jesus what happened to the days of Teen Titans? That had a nice balance of Dark moments and humor. 

And then there was Batman the brave and the bold! That was Dark and humorous! 

Now its like, DEATH DEATH DEATH, DEPRESSED, DEATH, SERIOUS MOMENT, Joke.....DEATH DEATH
